prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a mechanical creature with sharp wings and a streamlined body.
Generate an electric-type Pokemon that has a unique blend of blue and yellow colors with a metallic look.
Imagine a Pokemon with an insectoid shape and vivid colors, perfect for a forest or urban habitat.
Design a Pokemon that combines technology and nature, featuring vibrant wings and an energetic personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a sleek design, inspired by both insects and machines, with a mix of blue and black.
Make a bug/electric-type Pokemon that has distinctive facial features and a strong presence in both forests and caves.
Give me a Pokemon with an aerodynamic form, combining elements of both bug and electric types, and striking visual colors.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile with electric attacks
